sentences.sentence: Wholehearted service makes you felt delicate considerateness and care.
sentences.translation: 全身心的服务使您感受到入微的体贴与关怀。

sentences.sentence: Make oneself handsome and others happy. Wholehearted service makes you felt delicate considerateness and care.
sentences.translation: 潇洒自己，快乐他人。全身心的服务使您感受到入微的体贴与关怀。

sentences.sentence: OTC Suzhou promises to work under the principle of "Friendliness, Credibleness and Considerateness", and to provide the best service to every customer.
sentences.translation: 苏州海外旅游有限公司以“友好、守信、热诚、周到”为服务宗旨，热忱为旅游者提供最优质的服务。
